output_list.reason: The mint function does not check for overflow, allowing the total supply to be set to any arbitrary value.
The mint function allows any caller to set the balance of any account, granting the caller arbitrary tokens.
The migrate function does not check for overflow, allowing users to migrate arbitrary amounts of tokens.
The buyTokens function does not check for overflow, allowing users to buy arbitrary amounts of tokens.
The creditJackpotTokens function does not check for overflow, allowing users to receive arbitrary amounts of tokens.
